ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi

Class FlightController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.FlightController

  • public class FlightController
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entry class which manages the current state of the Flight Controller and triggers the control loop.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
